channel.title: Recommended Exercises :: AD2 Homepage
channel.description: Recommended exercises from the CLR3 book for exam preparation. Don’t forget the book is available online at the University library. All these exercises are from the third edition. I don’t have the answers to the questions, and some of the exercises are non-trivial but will give you a deeper understanding of the material in book. Chapter 15 15.1-2 15.1-3 15-2-2 15.4-1 15.4-2 15.4-3 Chapter 16 16.1-1 16.1-2 16.1-3 16.1-4 Chapter 21
